content: The Snake Herbalist has a basket full of poison on its back as well, so keep an eye on your status effects during this fight. Take some Antimiasma Powder when necessary.

The Snake Herbalist has a basket full of poison on its back as well, so keep an eye on your status effects during this fight. Take some Antimiasma Powder when necessary.
